title: Help Darryl Comprehend What He is Reading By Having Gist Conversations
description: "Gist" is a great tool for helping readers develop a reoccurring habit of self monitoring. The goal of this action plan is for Darryl to not get stuck in the weeds with every vocabulary word but instead nudge him to be focusing on the main idea of what he has just read. By having quick, frequent conversations with Darryl you can help him develop this habit in just a few weeks.
action: Dive into the Gist action plan

title: Assist Darry in Selecting Fiction Books That Match His Developmental Level
description: For his independent reading to have a positive impact on Darryl’s comprehension he needs to be engaging with books at the right level. Too easy, and he won’t be pushed to stretch his abilities. Too hard and it is likely to be a frustrating experience. Using online tools you can help him select books in his development sweetspot.
action: View the Selecting Books action plan

title: Work With Darryl to Master More Grade Level Vocabulary
description: Knowing Darryl needs increased support to build out his understanding of grade level appropriate vocabulary helping him work through a set of flashcards is a quick way to help him feel more comfortable when tackling challenging texts.
action: Review the Grade Level Vocab action plan
